badges.Title: No Badges
badges.Body: {0} does not own any gym badges. Fight gym leaders using **/gymbattle** to obtain badges.

badges.Title: No Badges
badges.Body: No badges obtained for the {0} region. Fight gym leaders using **/gymbattle** to obtain badges.

modifyteam.Title: Cannot Modify Team
modifyteam.Body: You only have one Pokemon that is already in your team! Catch more by using the **/spawn** command and try again.

modifyteam.Title: Cannot Modify Team
modifyteam.Body: You have the minimum of one Pokemon in your team with nothing else to swap with. Specify a Pokemon when calling the command to add more Pokemon to your team.

modifyteam.Title: Invalid Pokemon
modifyteam.Body: You do not own any Pokemon with the name {0}.

release.Title: Invalid Pokemon
release.Body: You do not own any Pokemon with the name {0} or this Pokemon is currently in your team.

starter.Title: Unable to Create Trainer
starter.Body: Maybe you're already adventuring? Maybe there weren't any of the Pokemon you chose? Nah, must have been something else...

usepotion.Title: No Healing
usepotion.Body: You do not own any {0}s. Please visit the **/shop** to stock up.

usepotion.Title: Health Full
usepotion.Body: {0} not used because health is already full.

usepotion.Title: Invalid Command
usepotion.Body: Please select a potion from the provided list when executing the command. If no potions show up, you must first purchase one by using **/shop**.
